recommendations.text: Mohd brilliantly built our Gulf property platform from scratch, achieving 10K+ downloads in month one without any marketing. His offline features were a game-changer. Just like his passion for distance running, he brings unmatched endurance and drive to every project.

Mohd is a standout engineer who successfully led the delivery of three mobile apps for us. He went beyond frontend tasks, setting up Flutter CI/CD pipelines and managing our server infrastructure. His natural passion for gadgets and tech makes him an invaluable innovator.

Mohd modernized our logistics operations by building a high-performance cross-platform Flutter app. He flawlessly integrated complex features like real-time tracking and Stripe Tap-to-Pay. His fast-paced startup experience makes him an exceptionally reliable and efficient developer.

Mohd digitized our manual workflows, boosting our operational efficiency by an impressive 40-45%. He built highly secure features, including banking-app-style session timeouts and handled our database migration to Supabase. He is a brilliant developer who deeply understands business processes.
